about_the_game:
Gatherings is a 2 to 8 player party game designed to ruin any remaining friendships you may still have. Create a Lobby, gather your friends and dive right in! No board, no drawn-out game modes, just pure fun, excitement and chaotic, friendship destroying action.

But try to make peace with your friends before the end of each game tho, Gatherings is not meant to be a single player game.

The Party in Action


Get your friends together, create or join a lobby, pick your character, and hit start! The first player to reach the lobby score limit takes home the crown.



  • Not a fan of certain Mini-Games ? - No problem! Disable the ones you don’t like and customize the experience to your liking.
  • Short on Time ? - Adjust the score limit and play a quick session, so Gatherings fits your schedule no matter how busy things get.

What's on the menu ?




  • No board - Jump in the action, It’s all gameplay, all the time!
  • Up to 8 players online - Whether you’re rolling with a full crew or just a few friends, the mini-games adapt to the size of your party!
  • 20+ chaotic, skill based minigames - Classic shooter, racing, cooking, platformer, physics based madness, there’s always a mini-game where you can (try to) shine.

Here's a taste of what's in store :




  • Deceitful Dungeon - Ah, the thrill of taking down mobs with friends... except for that one who keeps swiping your loot, right? Well, that's the twist in this game: team up to slay the mobs and make sure you grab the most loot to come out on top!
  • Cooking chaos - Cooperation is key in the kitchen, but what happens when everyone’s out for themselves? Compete to see who can deliver the most dishes and claim victory!
  • Platformer madness - Ever played those game where the only goal is to go up ? Now imagine doing that with your friends—only this time, you can knock them down when they get a little too good for your liking!
  • Transport Takedown - Load up your pickup and race to fill your warehouse with the most cargo! But beware—it's not just about hauling your own stuff; you can also steal from your friends!



And many more mini games including, gungames, racing game, time attack, memory game and some original concept that you'll enjoy discovering!

You have feedback?


Please join us on our discord (you'll find the link on the right panel) or share you thought through Steam Community forums.
We're a team of three friends doing this part time, yet we push updates very regularly based on your feedback, so don't be shy come on in!
